description:
Animated rosary app with a focus on UX supporting multiple languages
Rosarium is a mobile rosary to guide you through every prayer you need.

I put the focus on UX as I feel it gets left behind in most rosary-apps I've used so far.
The transitions between decades is animated, you can hot-switch between languages and progressing through the beads by tapping is visualized as well.

Languages supported so far:
    - German
    - English
    - Latin
    - Slovenian
    - French
    - Dutch
    - Portuguese

If yours is missing, feel free to open a PR ;)

The holy mysteries are date-aware and should show the correct one depending on day-of-week and season. If it doesn't that's a bug, please let me know.

Here's a small summary

Sunday	  - Glorious
Monday	  - Joyful
Tuesday	  - Sorrowful
Wednesday - Glorious
Thursday  - Luminous
Friday	  - Sorrowful
Saturday  - Joyful
Sundays in Lent	  - Sorrowful
Sundays in Advent - Joyful

There are quite a few interpretations which prayers should be in the rosary so I decided to include more rather than less.
If you prefer not to pray the Fatima prayer (you should pray it) or the Hail Holy Queen you can just toggle them in the settings.
